MST_SKILLS_4401_NAME.en: Let's go on an adventure that'll raise the hair on our necks!
MST_SKILLS_4401_NAME.es: ¡Embarquémonos en una aventura que nos deje los pelos de punta!
MST_SKILLS_4401_NAME.pt: Vamos em uma aventura que vai te deixar arrepiado!
MST_SKILLS_4401_NAME.th: ออกไปผจญภัยที่จะทำให้พวกเราขนหัวลุกกันเถอะ!
MST_SKILLS_4401_NAME.vi: Hãy tham gia một cuộc phiêu lưu sẽ làm dựng tóc gáy chúng ta!

MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.en: I'll trust my sword until the end. It won't fail me!
MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.es: Confiaré en mi espada hasta el final. ¡No me fallará!
MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.id: Aku percaya pedangku sampai akhir. Ia tak pernah mengecewakanku!
MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.pt: Confiarei em minha espada até o fim. Ela não falhará comigo.
MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.th: ข้าเชื่อมั่นในดาบของข้าจนถึงที่สุด มันจะไม่ทำให้ข้าผิดหวัง!
MST_SKILLS_4402_NAME.vi: Đến tận cùng ta vẫn sẽ tin tưởng thanh kiếm của ta. Nó sẽ không làm ta thất vọng!

MST_SKILLS_4403_NAME.en: Give me more, more! You call this a battle?!
MST_SKILLS_4403_NAME.id: Mau lagi! Kau bilang ini perang?!
MST_SKILLS_4403_NAME.pt: Me dê mais, mais! Você chama isso de batalha?!
MST_SKILLS_4403_NAME.th: เอามาให้ข้าอีกสิ!! แบบนี้เจ้าเรียกว่าการต่อสู้แล้วอย่างนั้นรึ?!
MST_SKILLS_4403_NAME.vi: Hãy cho ta thêm, thêm nữa! Ngươi gọi đây là một trận chiến?!

MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.en: No one can defeat the power of my axe!
MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.es: ¡Nadie puede derrotar el poder de mi hacha!
MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.id: Tidak ada yang bisa mengalahkan kekuatan kapakku!
MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.pt: Ninguém pode derrotar o poder do meu machado!
MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.th: ไม่มีใครกำราบพลังจากขวานของข้าได้!
MST_SKILLS_4521_NAME.vi: Không ai có thể đánh bại sức mạnh cây rìu của ta!

MST_SKILLS_4522_NAME.en: My axe can tear down mountains!
MST_SKILLS_4522_NAME.th: ขวานของข้าทำลายล้างภูเขาได้!
MST_SKILLS_4522_NAME.vi: Cây rìu của ta có thể xẻ núi!

MST_SKILLS_4523_NAME.en: My axe can sink whole continents!
MST_SKILLS_4523_NAME.th: ขวานของข้าทำให้ทั้งทวีปจมลงได้!
MST_SKILLS_4523_NAME.vi: Cây rìu của ta có thể nhấn chìm toàn bộ các lục địa!

MST_SKILLS_4524_NAME.en: And I will continue growing even stronger!
MST_SKILLS_4524_NAME.id: Dan aku akan terus bertambah lebih kuat!
MST_SKILLS_4524_NAME.pt: E eu ficarei ainda mais forte!
MST_SKILLS_4524_NAME.th: แล้วข้าก็จะแข็งแกร่งขึ้นเรื่อยๆ!
MST_SKILLS_4524_NAME.vi: Và ta sẽ tiếp tục phát triển mạnh hơn nữa!

MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.en: Nonsense! My axe is the strongest in the world!
MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.es: ¡Tonterías! ¡Mi hacha es la más fuerte del mundo!
MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.id: Nonsens! Kapakku adalah yang terkuat di dunia!
MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.pt: Bobagem! Meu machado é o mais forte do mundo!
MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.th: งี่เง่า! ขวานของข้าแกร่งที่สุดในโลก!
MST_SKILLS_4541_NAME.vi: Vô lý! Cây rìu của ta mạnh nhất thế giới!

MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.en: My axe can part the ocean with one swing!
MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.es: ¡Mi hacha puede partir el océano de un golpe!
MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.id: Kapakku bisa membelah lautan dengan sekali ayun!
MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.pt: Meu machado pode partir o oceano em um golpe!
MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.th: ขวานข้าตัดผ่าทะเลได้ในการเหวี่ยงครั้งเดียว!
MST_SKILLS_4542_NAME.vi: Cây rìu của ta có thể chia đại dương bằng một nhát chém!

MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.en: My axe can split the world in half!
MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.es: ¡Mi hacha puede partir el mundo a la mitad!
MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.id: Kapakku bisa membelah dunia menjadi dua!
MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.pt: Meu machado pode rachar o mundo em dois!
MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.th: ขวานของข้าแบ่งโลกเป็นสองซีกได้!
MST_SKILLS_4543_NAME.vi: Cây rìu của ta có thể chẻ thế giới thành đôi!

MST_SKILLS_4544_NAME.en: I am the strongest by far!
MST_SKILLS_4544_NAME.pt: Eu sou o mais forte, de longe!
MST_SKILLS_4544_NAME.th: ข้าคือผู้ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!
MST_SKILLS_4544_NAME.vi: Ta là kẻ mạnh nhất cho đến nay!

MST_SKILLS_4570_NAME.th: ดาร์คเนส เมเธโอ

MST_SKILLS_4571_NAME.en: Foolish human... I'll deal with you personally.
MST_SKILLS_4571_NAME.id: Manusia tolol... Kau akan kuurus langsung.
MST_SKILLS_4571_NAME.pt: Humano tolo... Vou lidar com você pessoalmente.

MST_SKILLS_4571_NAME.vi: Con người xuẩn ngốc... Ta sẽ xử lý riêng ngươi.

MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.en: I shall lead you to ruin, child of sin...
MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.es: Te llevaré a la ruina, hijo del pecado...
MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.id: Aku akan membimbingmu hancur, anak berdosa...
MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.pt: Vou te levar à ruína, cria do pesadelo...
MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.th: ข้าอาจทำให้เจ้าต้องพินาศ บุตรแห่งบาป...
MST_SKILLS_4572_NAME.vi: Ta sẽ cho ngươi tiêu tùng, đồ con hoang...

MST_SKILLS_4580_NAME.th: ธันเดอร์ ออเดอร์

MST_SKILLS_4581_NAME.th: ไปเลย อาร์ดาส

MST_SKILLS_4582_NAME.en: Farza, burn everything to a crisp.
MST_SKILLS_4582_NAME.pt: Farza, torre tudo até só restarem cinzas.
MST_SKILLS_4582_NAME.th: ฟาร์ซ่า จงแผดเผาให้ทุกอย่างมอดไหม้
MST_SKILLS_4582_NAME.vi: Farza, hãy quay giòn mọi thứ.

MST_SKILLS_4583_NAME.pt: A hora é agora... esmaguem tudo!
MST_SKILLS_4583_NAME.th: ตอนนี้ล่ะ...ทำลายทุกอย่างลงซะ!
MST_SKILLS_4583_NAME.vi: Giờ đã đến lúc...đè bẹp tất cả!

MST_SKILLS_4584_NAME.en: Hmph... Are you defying my commands?
MST_SKILLS_4584_NAME.th: หืม...เจ้าปฏิเสธคำสั่งข้างั้นเหรอ?
MST_SKILLS_4584_NAME.vi: Hừm... Ngươi dám kháng lệnh của ta sao?

MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.en: What a good boy. You deserve a reward.
MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.es: Qué buen chico. Mereces una recompensa.
MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.id: Anak yang baik. Kamu pantas mendapat hadiah.
MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.pt: Que bom garoto. Merece uma recompensa.
MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.th: เป็นเด็กดีอะไรอย่างนี้ สมควรได้รับรางวัล
MST_SKILLS_4585_NAME.vi: Tốt lắm. Ngươi xứng dáng được thưởng.

MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.en: I get seriously angry at times too, you know?
MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.es: Hay momentos en los que me enojo mucho, ¿sabes?
MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.id: Aku juga serius marah kadang-kadang, kamu tahu?
MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.pt: Às vezes eu realmente perco a calma com você, sabia?
MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.th: ตอนนี้ข้าโกรธมากเช่นกัน รู้มั้ย?
MST_SKILLS_4586_NAME.vi: Đôi khi ta cũng rất tức giận, ngươi biết chứ?

MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.en: Looks like I have no choice... Time to get serious.
MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.es: Parece que no tengo alternativa... Hora de ponerse serio.
MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.id: Sepertinya aku tidak punya pilihan… Saatnya serius.
MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.pt: Parece que não tenho escolha... Hora de levar a sério.
MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.th: ดูข้าจะไม่มีทางเลือกสินะ... ต้องจริงจังแล้วล่ะ
MST_SKILLS_4587_NAME.vi: Có vẻ như ta không có lựa chọn... Tới lúc nghiêm túc rồi.

MST_SKILLS_4588_NAME.th: พัลเวอริเซอร์

MST_SKILLS_4591_NAME.en: I'll turn you into ashes with my thunder!
MST_SKILLS_4591_NAME.id: Aku akan membuatmu menjadi debu dengan gunturku!
MST_SKILLS_4591_NAME.pt: Vou transformar você em cinzas com meu trovão!
MST_SKILLS_4591_NAME.th: ข้าจะทำให้เจ้าเป็นธุลีด้วยสายฟ้าของข้า!
MST_SKILLS_4591_NAME.vi: Ta sẽ biến ngươi thành tro bụi bằng đòn sấm sét của ta!

MST_SKILLS_4592_NAME.en: No! Now is not the time for that!
MST_SKILLS_4592_NAME.id: Tidak! Sekarang bukan saatnya untuk itu!
MST_SKILLS_4592_NAME.pt: Não! Agora não é hora disso!
MST_SKILLS_4592_NAME.th: ไม่! นี่ไม่ใช่เวลาจะมาทำแบบนั้น!
MST_SKILLS_4592_NAME.vi: Không! Giờ chưa phải lúc là chuyện đó!
